derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French terroriste, from Latin terror (see terror). The word was originally applied to supporters of the Jacobins in the French Revolution, who advocated repression and violence in pursuit of the principles of democracy and equality

entry.def: A terrorist is a person who uses violence, especially murder and bombing, in order to achieve political aims.

example.ex: One American was killed and three were wounded in terrorist attacks.
example.tran: 在几起恐怖袭击中，一名美国人遇难，三人受伤。

means.word_mean: 1. a radical who employs terror as a political weapon; usually organizes with other terrorists in small cells; often uses religion as a cover for terrorist activities
1. characteristic of someone who employs terrorism (especially as a political weapon);

auth_sentence.content: The United States deemed him to be a terrorist.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The United States deemed him to be a terrorist.

auth_sentence.content: Concern is growing about possible terrorist strikes in Europe.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =earth,表示"土地"; 2. =frighten,可怕,恐惧; 3. =frighten,表示"恐,怕"

stems_affixes.value_cn: [comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
stems_affixes.word_buile: extra外+terrestrial[adj.地球的，地球上的]→adj.[comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的
subterrane[n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室]+ean→adj.地下的
terr土地+estrial→adj.地球的，地球上的
territory[n.领土;版图;领域,范围]+ial……的→territorial领土的
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ent……的→deterrent威慑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很糟的;可怕的,骇人的;极度的,厉害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+ible可..的→可怕的
terr恐,怕+ific产生……的→带来可怕→好到让人可怕的地步→极好的
extra外+territorial[adj.领土的,土地的,地方的]+ity表名词→n.治外法权
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下层; 洞穴, 地下室
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+terr土地+ane→n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室
terr土地+ace→n.平台,阳台,露台
terr土地+ain表名词→n.地势,地形
terr土地+it+ory场所,范围→地的范围,领土
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ment表名词→n.制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+or表名词→n.恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
terror恐怖+ist人→n.恐怖分子
dis离,出+inter埋→v.挖出,掘土
in进+ter=terr土地→v.埋葬
de去+ter=terr恐,怕→吓跑了,吓得不动了
terr恐,怕+ify使……→v.使害怕,使惊恐

Sentence.sentence: This year, without a terrorist attack, the hotel industry is "putting the same numbers on the board", says Mr Sorenson.
According to Arne Sorenson, the president of Marriott hotels, the current recession hit his business as hard as the 9/11 terrorist attack.
hit his business as hard as the 9/11 terrorist attack.
A terrorist forced it to land on Tenerife.
